description: Change is good. But changing layers every five minutes? You have better things to do. With a soft airmesh lining on the inside, and breathable, abrasion-resistant Pertex® Quantum Air stretch fabric on the outside, the Kor Airshell™ Warm Jacket is a dynamic duo of technical performance. The jacket's active insulation keeps you warm and fends off wind and light moisture while remaining incredibly breathable, so you can keep skiing, running, climbing, or hiking.
name: Mountain Hardwear Kor AirShell Warm Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Pertex® Quantum Air™ 20D Stretch Ripstop - 59% Recycled Nylon, 41% Nylon
